name: Why Mars?
description:
Story

After being sentenced to death, our main character, who thinks that he has nothing to lose, starts not to enjoy life after he lost something in prison. He comes out of prison and encounters the love of his life, and this is a way of salvation for him. Now he is going to go on a lot of different adventures to be together with this being, which is the most important thing for himself.

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys
Actions (Opening Door, Pet, Use computer) - press X
Undo Last Input - press Z
Restart the Level - press R

Goals

Your main goal is to pet your dolphin.

Specific Level Goals

- Stay away from other cars and try to reach the yellow arrow.
- If there is a yellow arrow at the level try to reach that.
- If there is a dolphin in the screen, get close as possible to it and pet.
- Use your computer to learn what to do.
- Move all crates to targets
- Complete mazes

Other Information

This short game made for Game 206 Course's final assignment.

Made with PuzzleScript in 5~ hours. You can hack this game from here.
